original_title: MPs unite to address issues in Aswesuma
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A group of parliamentarians from both the ruling party and the opposition has come together to address the problems in the Aswesuma Welfare Benefit Scheme. The initiative aims to send a letter to the President, highlighting the issues faced by the beneficiaries.
According to Jagath Kumara, Member of Parliament from the Colombo District, a total of 57 MPs have expressed their support for this initiative.
